Previously, he worked at Google, building models for personalized
content recommendations, systems for exploring new content, as well as
compact language models.

*Introduction to TensorFlow Serving*

TensorFlow Serving is a flexible, high-performance serving system for machine learning models, designed for production environments. In this talk, we will cover using pre-built TF Serving binary to deploy a basic model and make a quick intro to the extension mechanisms for advanced use cases.
